sentences.en: It's necessary to instil the minds of the youth with lofty ideals.
sentences.cn: 把崇高理想灌输到年青人的思想中去是很必要的.

sentences.en: It's the responsibility of parents to instil a sense of discipline in their children.
sentences.cn: 管教子女是父母的责任.

sentences.en: The inspiring teachers not only impart knowledge, they also instil moral values in their students.
sentences.cn: 二、模范教师不但教华文, 还负起培养学生正确的人生观.

sentences.en: The motive of the executions would be to instil fear.
sentences.cn: 执行死刑的动机是要灌输恐惧。

sentences.en: The screams of the wounded and dying were something to instil fear into the stoutest heart.
sentences.cn: 受伤者垂死者的尖叫,令最勇敢的人都胆战心惊.

sentences.en: The tough thing is trying to instil a winning attitude in the kids.
sentences.cn: 困难在于要尽力给孩子们灌输胜利的心态。

trans.tran_en: to teach someone to think, behave, or feel in a particular way over a period of time
to teach someone to think, behave, or feel in a particular way over a period of time
